value:
This castle is amazing! There is so
much going on here and SO many
people! This looks like FUN!

I love my brother, Hríd, and my
sisters, Gunnthrá and Fjorm. They're
always nice to me.

When I was stuck in Múspell, I made
friends with this scary-looking soldier.
He was actually nice. Sort of.

My big brother Hríd is the best.
Strong, smart, daring... As long as
he's around, Nifl will be fine.

When they conquered Nifl...I couldn't
do a thing about it. I'm still so sorry
about that...

Hello there! My name's Ylgr. This
castle looks interesting... Is there
anything fun to do around here?

I'm getting better and better... I'm
almost TOO good!

I'm a princess of Nifl. Don't you
forget it!
What, what, what? No way!

Hey, thanks! I'm excited to get back
out there. Let's go!

I'm Ylgr. Where am I? You mean I've
been summoned? I'm a Hero? Are
you kidding me?! Eeee!

This place is amazing! Thank you,
$Nu!$k$pThanks to you, I get to go on fun
adventures day after day.$k$pWhy are you so nice to me? Maybe
you...like me? Maybe a little bit?$k$pAaagh! I'm so embarrassed just
talking about this! And what am I
going to do if it's true?$k$pDon't tell me! I mean, if you did, it
would be OK.$k$pEither way, I want to stay friends with
you.
えーいっ
ごめんね
きゃああっ！
いたぁい…
Sorry!
I am having so much fun!
Ha-ha-hah!
Boring, boring, boring.
Oh well.
えへへ
I'm Ylgr. Come on! Show me something fun.
Oh, hey. You scared me!
Snow, snow, snow. I come from the land of boring, boring, boring, boring snow.
Ooh. Do you want to play with me?
I've always wanted to go on a big, big, big adventure. Like in my books!
I'm...so sorry.
You're fun. I never ever ever get bored when I'm with you.
OK.
OK...
OK!
